For the second time...

Yes, please take me off, too.  I have no idea what in Primus's name is
going on, and I have not read a single message that tells me.  My
personal folder is getting filled up, and it is quite time-consuming to
have to drag all the messages from the "Inbox" to my mailbox.  I have
neither the time nor the inclination to read them, as I have absolutely
no idea what is happening in this story, or any stories.

Thank you,
Nick a.k.a. Anolis
